title: Community Marketing & Communications Strategist
description: Acid.info needs a community marketing and communications strategy wizard to join its Movement Building and Campaign Activation unit. The chosen applicant will be tasked with developing a clear, purpose-driven communications strategy for multiple teams under the wider organization’s umbrella. We’re looking for an inspiring, motivating, impactful and energetic individual to take the reigns and reflect these qualities and our political philosophy across all future communications.
